706922f-a.text:
2-10 Stuyvesant Ave., west side, south from Broadway to Vernon Aves. No. 10 at Vernon Av:., is in the foreground. The Broadway B.M.T. Elevated Lines are in the background.

P. L. Sperr.

707204f-a.text:
Vernon Avenue, west from near Stuyvesant Avenue, showing construction operations on a W. P. A. sewer pro
ject.
May 6, 1936

Five Boroughs Project
